instructions: Put the dinner fork on the left side of the table cloth, prongs facing up
place the dinner knife on the right side of the cloth, blade up
add a salad fork to the left of the dinner fork, same way up
add a salad knife to the right of the dinner knife, same way up
add a soup spoon to the left of the knives, bowl facing up
place a dessert spoon horizontally in between the knives and forks but higher up on the cloth
move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon, facing up
move the knives closer to the left, and put the dessert spoon back where it was
add a dinner plate between the cutlery
add a bread plate to the north west of the table
put a butter knife on the bread plate in the north west, with the blade facing south west
add a wine glass above the soup spoon
add a water glass between the wine glass and dessert spoon
place a napkin in the middle of the dinner plate
